ing: 2 (7 ounce) pouches skinless, boneless salmon, drained and flaked
1 sleeve buttery round crackers (such as RitzÂ®), crushed
des: "Salmon lovers and those who like non-traditional cheese balls will enjoy this nice appetizer. Finely chopped nuts or parsley may be substituted for cracker crumbs. Great for cocktail parties, showers, and family get-togethers. You can roll the finished ball in finely crushed pecans, slivered almonds, or finely minced parsley as you wish."
ins:
Thoroughly mix cream cheese, lemon juice, minced onion, horseradish, salt, and liquid smoke in a bowl. Fold salmon through the mixture to distribute evenly; shape into a ball.
Refrigerate ball until firm, about 30 minutes.
Spread crackers onto a plate. Roll ball in crackers to coat. Keep chilled until serving.
